channel.title: Comments on: UPDATE: Led Zeppelin reunion rumors bollocks

item.title: By: Chandler
item.dc:creator: Chandler
item.description:
That dude from mean venus aint opening for nobody. He died 6 months ago from heroin. I heard that was one of the reasons that Plant isn't doing the tour too. After this Krauss b.s. he is done. Really ashame the Zep guys can't honor Plant's decision and understand that losing your son to heroin is something that most people never emotionally come back from.
RIP J
MEAN VENUS ruled!!!
item.content:encoded:

Really ashame the Zep guys can’t honor Plant’s decision and understand that losing your son to heroin is something that most people never emotionally come back from.

RIP J

item.title: By: estelle
item.dc:creator: estelle
item.description:
This Mean Venus guy has supposedly landed the Velvet Revolver gig now. i guess it is all who you know in the music business. he better be fricking good that's all i know. plant's son or not, scott weiland has some pretty big shoes to fill. good luck there "J". hope this dont interfere with the reunion tour ;)
estelle

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: that's the second time that spam comment has been left. we get it. you're on the street team for some fruitcake named mean venus. enough already.
item.content:encoded: that’s the second time that spam comment has been left. we get it. you’re on the street team for some fruitcake named mean venus. enough already.

item.title: By: hannah
item.dc:creator: hannah
item.description: Who will Led Zeppelin have as an opening act on their 2008 US tour??? The rumors have finally been silenced: Plant has personally tapped his illegitimate son's band--MEAN VENUS--to open all 2008 shows. MEAN VENUS' lead singer, J, when recently interviewed by Rolling Stone magazine, spoke of his utter disbelief at the prospect: "I only found out he [Plant] was my dad a few years ago. My mum hid it from me for the majority of my life. So to actually be going on the road with my Dad is bloody outrageous!".....
item.content:encoded:
Who will Led Zeppelin have as an opening act on their 2008 US tour???
The rumors have finally been silenced: Plant has personally tapped his illegitimate son’s band–MEAN VENUS–to open all 2008 shows.
MEAN VENUS’ lead singer, J, when recently interviewed by Rolling Stone magazine, spoke of his utter disbelief at the prospect:
“I only found out he [Plant] was my dad a few years ago.
My mum hid it from me for the majority of my life. So to actually be going on the road with my Dad is bloody outrageous!”…..

item.title: By: patrick
item.dc:creator: patrick
item.description: man, you sure showed him, tim. sick burn, dude.
item.content:encoded: man, you sure showed him, tim. sick burn, dude.
